canBuy(ShopItemStack) - Method in class bukkit.Vandolis.EconEntity
Checks to see if the entity has enough money to buy, as well as checks to see if they can buy the amount given based on the buyMax.
canSell(ShopItemStack) - Method in class bukkit.Vandolis.EconEntity
Checks to see if the entity can sell the item by seeing if they have the required items, as well as if they can sell the given amount based on sellMax.
cashOnly - Variable in class bukkit.Vandolis.Transaction
 
cashOnly() - Method in class bukkit.Vandolis.Transaction
Returns the boolean of whether or not it is a cash only Transaction.
checkAllowed(ShopItemStack) - Method in class bukkit.Vandolis.EconEntity
Checks the entities ShopGroup to see if they are allowed to buy that item.
checkEnoughSlots(ShopItemStack) - Method in class bukkit.Vandolis.EconEntity
Called if the entity is a User.
checkHasItems(ShopItemStack) - Method in class bukkit.Vandolis.EconEntity
Checks to see if the entity has the required items.
checkMaxBuy(ShopItemStack) - Method in class bukkit.Vandolis.EconEntity
Checks to see if the entity can buy the given amount of items based on the ShopItem maxBuy.
checkMaxSell(ShopItemStack) - Method in class bukkit.Vandolis.EconEntity
Checks to see if the entity can sell the given amount of items based on the ShopItem maxSell.
